tool_description: Schedules and tracks preventive maintenance for imaging equipment based on usage patterns and manufacturer recommendations.

equipment_id.description: Unique identifier for the imaging equipment

maintenance_type.description: Type of maintenance: preventive, corrective, calibration, inspection

error_messages: Equipment ID not found: The specified equipment ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid maintenance type: Use one of [preventive, corrective, calibration, inspection].
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [routine, high, critical].
Scheduling conflict: The requested maintenance time conflicts with existing schedules.
Equipment currently in use: Cannot schedule maintenance while equipment is actively being used.
usage: Provide equipment_id and maintenance_type to schedule maintenance. Optionally specify urgency_level for priority scheduling.

scheduled_date.description: ISO 8601 date and time of scheduled maintenance

maintenance_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled maintenance

next_due_date.description: ISO 8601 date when next maintenance will be due
